name: Helpful Hazards
description: In this top down RPG filled with culinary magic, master is away and it is up to you to protect the forest. With Stanley the ravenous and gelatinous salamander reeking havoc everywhere, it is up to you to stop him. Quickly roam through the forest and collect ingredients to make a magic aid that helps defeat  him. Be careful though, if you combine the wrong things the very opposite could happen!
